column5: Sorry to hear of your loss, Tinman. My condolences to you and your family.
sorry for your loss...deepest condolences

Got the phone call i was dreading today. My grandmother had a stroke 2 weeks ago and seemed on the mend. My uncle called today and told me she had passed at aroun 12 pm. The toughest part was calling my dad on his cruise and giving him the bad news. She was 86. God bless Grandma.
Sorry for your loss. I lost my grandmother just before Christmas
Sorry to hear Tinman.
My condolences Tinman.  Michael
My condolences to you and your family  Rob
Sorry to hear Timman.  Our thoughts and prayers are with you and your family.  Ron...
Sorry for your family loss, one of lifes saddest moments.
Sorry to hear about your loss.May God rest her soul in peice,
sorry about the news friend.
very sorry about your loss, my thoughts are with you and your family.  jason

Prayers from London,ON.   The Prayer of St. Francis of Assisi   Lord, make me an instrument of your peace, Where there is hatred, let me sow love; where there is injury, pardon; where there is doubt, faith; where there is despair, hope; where there is darkness, light; where there is sadness, joy;  O Divine Master, grant that I may not so much seek to be consoled as to console; to be understood as to understand; to be loved as to love.  For it is in giving that we receive; it is in pardoning that we are pardoned; and it is in dying that we are born to eternal life.
Our condolences to you and your family Tinman
Very sorry to hear of your loss. May she be in peace. Grandmothers are a treasure we must remember and keep close to our hearts forever.
Sorry to hear about your loss Tinman...my thoughts and prayers go out to you and your family.
Sorry to hear, may she rest in peace.
Condolences Tinman....86 years should give lots of reasons to celebrate her life
My thoughts and prayers are with you and your family... You will have many moments to share memories over the next while... I hope in those you find comfort.  Jen
well put...  Sorry to hear bout your loss!
Sad news, sorry for your loss.
my condolences also, lost both grandma's years ago but remember them often.
Sorry to hear about your loss. My thoughts and prayers are with you and your family...

Sorry for your loss. my Grandma is in the hospital right now, going to visit in a few minutes. She is very sick and not ecpected to leave the hospital. it's hard going through these life events but like your Grandma mine is 86 years old and raised 13 children ,what a amazing woman she is and I am sure the same can be said for most grandma's it's a real shame when they leave us . In the last 4 years I've lost my Dad 2 uncle's and my Grandpa and I really feel for ya it's tuff lossing someone.
Grandma's are real special people, sorry for you loss Tinman.
Very sorry to hear of your lost Tinman...  Please accept my sincerest sympathies. Leechman
Our deepest sympathies Tinman, our thoughts are with you and your family right now.  Joey & Tybo
